name: Click2Confuse
description:
Play as yourself, a savvy patron of the arts who is willing to attempt logic puzzles with or without the aid of linear algebra.

Your adventure begins here, in the Clicktastrophe, the first part in an epic trilogy of non-trivial challenges.

Your objective is to become confused in 90 unique and terrifying ways.  Coincidentally, 90 is also the number of levels in the game.

Clicking any polygon will cause it and its neighbors to immediately change color, and the level will end once all polygons are the same color as the background.

As this is my first game, I'm open to suggestions for how to improve your experience playing it!  If you notice that something is missing or isn't working, please submit a comment.
